backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files and their responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point setting metadata, manifest, icons, and mounting the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest declaring app name, icons, colors, and display mode.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with root, start, and game routes inside AppLayout.
frontend/src/components/game/DoubleFinis: Modal prompting the user to confirm a double finish with Yes/No actions.
frontend/src/components/game/GameOverScr: Card-based Game Over screen showing winner, turn count, and rematch/new game actions.
frontend/src/components/game/Keypad.tsx: Numeric keypad with quick-score buttons, input display, clear, and submit actions.
Displays a player's name, remaining score, and active status styling.
frontend/src/components/game/TurnHistory: Renders the last five turns with player, score, remaining, and status indicators.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that initializes and refreshes a backend actor based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, wrapping AuthClient setup and exposing identity, login, logout, and status state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom CSS variables for theming, including light and dark mode palettes.
frontend/src/layouts/AppLayout.tsx: Layout component with header, footer, and main content outlet for the Dart Scoring app.
frontend/src/lib/gameCore.ts: Pure game logic module handling game initialization, turn application with bust and double-out rules, state transitions, and history tracking.
frontend/src/lib/gameSettings.ts: Defines game settings schema and utilities for saving, loading, and sanitizing settings using localStorage.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/GamePage.tsx: Game screen managing gameplay flow, turn input, validation, undo, double-out confirmation, and game-over handling.
frontend/src/pages/StartGamePage.tsx: Page for configuring and saving game settings, including mode, double-out option, and player names before starting a game.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom fonts, OKLCH-based color tokens, extended radii, shadows, and custom animations. Includes plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a Next.js PWA for dart scoring, including architecture notes, planned UI, and implemented features. Outlines gameplay rules, component structure, and navigation requirements.
